benediction.data.day.6.name: Time Stop
benediction.data.day.6.description: Once this round, you can activate this ability to take another turn immediately after your current turn. Except if end of round is announced. This extra turn will not advance the timer
benediction.data.day.6.activation_remind: You have not Activated your Benediction for this Round. Do you want to continue with Exploration or check the Benediction first?
